Text: Andy is really cool, a must to listen to any guitar fan.
It's ok to download his music, but if you really like it BUY HIS CDs so he can keep composing!
Btw you can buy them at www.candyrat.com - his record label.
I just checked out candyrat.com per the above suggestion, and found a collaboration album with Andy McKee and Don Ross!  I'm downloading the mp3 version, it cost $10us.  thanks for the up, 6string
This guy is amazing. I plan to buy all of his albums as soon as I can afford it.

Better than buying the album - go to his shows if you can.  

I'm sorry, but selling albums is just simply not a great way to make money anymore.  People have gotten too used to free music.  People my age and younger simply do not buy music.  But guess what?  We go to concerts, and we go to cinemas to watch movies.  This is because the environment and experience of a live show or a cinema is much better than the 1-dimensional experience of a recorded album or a DVD.
